name: OuRCTC
small_desc: This gives an implementaion for railway booking system. This makes use of nodejs for server side.

name: Pagerank
small_desc: Implementation of PageRank algorithm, using different parallelization approaches. For now there are three of them available: Serial(no parallelization), OpenMP(shared memory), MPI(communication via network). We are going to benchmark them on different datasets.

name: Amazon-Review-Analyser
small_desc: Comparative Study of Machine Learning Approaches for Amazon Reviews.

name: EVOkE
small_desc: Image Attendance System is an online attendance system made as a part of CodeFunDo by MicroSoft. This app aims at marking the attendance status of a class by just clicking pictures thus conserving time and solving problems like proxy that are given by students.

name: Restaurant-Search
small_desc: Restaurant Management system implemented using JAVA at front-end and MYSQL database for the backend.

name: SockChat
small_desc: An android chat app which detects emotions based on text, and suggests songs based on emotions. It is a peer to peer chat application made using Sockets, as a part of course project for Computer Communication and Networks-IT251.

name: Live-video-streaming
small_desc: Stream a live-video from camera of an android device to any other device using Wowza Streaming Server.

name: Web-App-OCR
small_desc: This is a Web-App that reads an image and finds the text present in it. It uses Tesseract and Leptonica to process the image. Although the result in not hundred percent accurate improvements can be made by altering the image quality.

name: Full-Screen-for-Android
small_desc: This is a small app made for self-convenience that allows full screen mode on any app, it requires root permissions. There is no activity present in the app.
